Due to a bug in Samsungs\'s Software, you can experience the phone to read aloud some of your actions.\n \n To prevent this, you will need to disable Samsung TTS and Google TTS. This will not affect any app using TTS features.
Notifications Tracker service is not running currently. This service should be running in order for this app to give correct results.
Notification spy records all the incoming notifications.\n\nIt can be used to spy on someone or to analyze which app is spamming your mobile with unwanted notifications.

Hide app will hide the app icon but will still record all the notifications in background. Dial the passcode to bring back the app icon. Default code is 0000.

Ignore app will remove the notifications from specific app in this app.

Unwanted apps can be uninstalled by long click on that app.

Delete Icon removes the notification of specific app
Select the ignored apps to remove them from the ignored list.
Turn on the accessibility service in order to allow Notification spy to record all the 3rd party apps.
